docs.lead_paragraph: Chicken farms including Bell & Evans in Pennsylvania are using oregano-based products as substitutes for antibiotics, but research on their effectiveness is scant and many remain skeptical.

headline.seo: Chicken Farms Try Oregano as Antibiotic Substitute
headline.main: In Hopes of Healthier Chickens, Farms Turn to Oregano
headline.print_headline: In Hopes of Healthier Chickens, a Pennsylvania Company Adds Oregano to the Diet

docs.abstract: Chicken farms like Bell & Evans in Pennsylvania are using oregano-based products as substitutes for antibiotics, but research on their effectiveness is scant and many health care experts remain skeptical; sales in United States of organic meat, poultry and fish were small part of food market in 2011, totaling $538 million.
docs.snippet: Chicken farms including Bell & Evans in Pennsylvania are using oregano-based products as substitutes for antibiotics, but research on their effectiveness is scant and many remain skeptical.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Clinic hospital system finds innovative ways to cut the costs of treating a patient.

headline.seo: Approaching Illness as a Team at the Cleveland Clinic

docs.abstract: Editorial highlights work being done by Cleveland Clinic, long considered premier medical system; notes clinic is now gaining new renown for innovation in improving quality of medical care while holding down costs; contends clinic offers model that other health systems should learn from.
docs.snippet: The Cleveland Clinic hospital system finds innovative ways to cut the costs of treating a patient.

docs.lead_paragraph: How one scientist’s losing battle against his own cancer might save the rest of us.

headline.main: Is the Cure for Cancer Inside You?
headline.print_headline: Is The Cures For Cancer Already Inside You?

docs.abstract: Daniel Engber article on how scientist Ralph Steinman’s losing battle against his own cancer might save the rest of humankind.
docs.snippet: How one scientist’s losing battle against his own cancer might save the rest of us.
